#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>

using namespace std;

int FindSum( int n, int val ) {

	int sum, k, i;

	sum = 0;
	k = 2;
	i = val;

	while( ( n/i ) > 0 ) {
		sum += n/i;
		i = pow(val, k);
		k += 1;
	}	
	return sum;

}
int main() {

	int t, n;

	scanf("%d", &t);

	while( t-- ) {

		scanf("%d", &n );
		printf("%d\n%d\n%d\n", FindSum(n, 2), FindSum(n,3), FindSum(n,5));
	}
	return 0;
}
